base_fields = OrderedDict([(‘name’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>), (‘description’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>), (‘duration’, <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object>), (‘registrations’, <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>), (‘registrations_details’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>), (‘registration_kinds’, <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>), (‘registration_kinds_details’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>), (‘feedback’, <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>), (‘feedback_details’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>)])¶
clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - Check if feedback has been filled out - If a registration which needs a kind has been checked, make sure the kind is selected - If a registration which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a registration_kind which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If feedback is set to yes, make sure feedback_details has been filled out

declared_fields = OrderedDict()¶
media¶

model¶

alias of Session

widgets = {‘setting’: <django.forms.widgets.CheckboxSelectMultiple object>, ‘supervision’: <django.forms.widgets.RadioSelect object>}¶
base_fields = OrderedDict([(‘setting’, <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>), (‘setting_details’, <django.forms.fields.CharField object>), (‘supervision’, <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>), (‘tasks_number’, <django.forms.fields.IntegerField object>), (‘is_copy’, <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>), (‘parent_session’, <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>)])¶
clean()¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If a setting which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If is_copy is True, parent_session is required - If is_copy is False, tasks_number is required

declared_fields = OrderedDict([(‘is_copy’, <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>), (‘parent_session’, <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>)])¶

class tasks.models.Session(id, setting_details, supervision, order, tasks_number, tasks_duration, study)¶

Bases: core.models.SettingModel

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

current_task()¶

Returns the current (incomplete) Task. - If all Tasks are completed, the last Task is returned. - If no Tasks have yet been created, None is returned.
